@about_github.message: If you encountered any issue, please report it on

@about_review.message: If you like this add-on or have some ideas to improve it, please send a comment on

@confirm_text.message: The content of this page is blocked.

@manifest_description.message: Prevents intempestive opening of popups from website scripts.

@mode_blocking.message: Blocking Mode : Block all new tabs/windows opened by links or scripts.

@mode_confirm.message: Confirm Mode : Ask before opening and displaying content of new tabs/windows.

@mode_normal.message: Normal Mode : Allow the opening of new tabs and new windows.

@options_applycsp.message: In Blocking Mode, apply Content Security Policy to strictly block popups :

@options_popupfocus.message: In Confirm Mode, new tabs/windows must be focused in :

@options_showbadge.message: Show the tab count badge in the action button :
